review: Excellent antiemetic. It’s side effect of constipation works well in controlling acute episodes of gastritis/IBD. Constipation may last for 2-3 days when using as an antiemetic alone.

Zofran (ondansetron):I got prescribed zofran as needed for Nausea. I got diagnosed with GERD/GI problems and reflux which is causing all of the nausea. My PC recommended zofran to help nausea and to be honest, this does not help at all with the nausea and queasy feeling. Zofran also has serious side effects and I have noticed that I get very dizzy and lightheaded a short time after taking the medication. I was out to dinner once and took zofran before dinner because I felt awful. That was not a smart idea because I thought I was going to pass out at dinner since the side effects are so extreme. Do not take this medication long term unless you have a reason to because the side effects are kind of dangerous even if used for a short period of time. Be very careful when taking this medication. I stopped taking it because of the severe side effects and the fact that it was not helping my symptoms..

Zofran (ondansetron):I’m inpatient for severe nausea and have been given Zofran but I just read the info on this med and the action and side effects are almost what I’m trying to overcome. It was a blessing because it works really well I think it was IV  but it may be making me confused dizzy vision blurring maybe jaundice I’m not going to take it any more

So I’m in day 3 now of Gastroenteritis, which has been a lovely experience…. After waiting in an urgent care for nearly 5 hours, my area is inundated with COVID, I got 30 seconds to a minute and a half with a doctor! Hooray. Doc looks me over briefly, hears my story and prescribes ondansetron. Finally some relief? No such luck. This medication did absolutely nothing to alleviate my symptoms but on the bright side I was left with a splitting headache for the rest of the night. Cause you know, that’s good.

Zofran (ondansetron):I have been on Zofran for 8 years and it has been a lifesaver. I wake up nauseous every single day and the Zofran works within a half hour and I rarely need a repeat dose. I don't know what I would do without it!
Besides the 24 hour constipation from ondansetron, definitely a life saver when it comes to my gastroparesis. Not as strong, but takes the edge off.

Zofran (ondansetron):I get attacks that starts with coughing, that leads to  dry heaving and stomach cramps. Always lasts 24 hours (almost to the minute). I have take Zofran and morphine injection for symptoms. Helps some, but not total relief. Wish I had the relief you all get.

Zofran (ondansetron):Had gastroenteritis, couldn't stop vomiting. Called doctors on call, they came out at 2am and gave me a shot of maxolon (which worked in the past). Was good for about an hour and then it started again, every half hour until I felt like I was going to pass out. Went to the hospital, they gave me a Zofran wafer and I stopped throwing up within 10 minutes. Felt terrible from dehydration but the Zofran wafer stopped the vomiting in its tracks.I now keep Zofran wafers at home, let myself throw up 2-3 times when I get a stomach bug and then pop a Zofran wafer to stop it. Best thing ever.

I have severe GERD!!! It is awful when the nausea gets so bad my stomach is in my throat!!! Ugh!!! ZOFRAN 4mg works wonders for me!!! I love when it takes affect and the nausea is gone.  Thank you so much!!

Zofran (ondansetron):Gastroenteritis is horrible.  I started feeling sick and gassy on the first day.  On the second day I thought I was dying.  The pain and burning was so bad it made my chest hurt and I thought I was having a heart attack or anxiety attack.  Went to the doctor, was prescribed Zofran, almost took the sickness away completely!  Still some burning in the lower abdomen, but finally some relief!!!

Zofran (ondansetron):Salute to the inventor of this medicine Ondansetron . I have IBS-D and with severe flatulance discomfort and suffocating feeling. After taking the mouth dissolving tablet it acts like miracle. At first all the entrapped gas in abdomen comes out in the form of belching and burping and thereafter the normalcy comes to the body and mind. All other medicines have not worked . This is great.
Zofran (ondansetron):I have major anxiety and reoccurring gastroenteritis since childhood. Throwing up and can’t stop. Dehydrated. It’s used for my anxiety and stomach. Never will go without it again
Zero side effects, immensely helped with nausea for gastro.
Zofran (ondansetron):I have suffered with nausea all my life. Zofran is the best out there for thus.
Zofran (ondansetron):I have never had any issues with Zofran. It always takes care of my nausea before it leads to vomiting

Zofran (ondansetron):I'm unsure with this one. Yes it helps the nausea a little but I was admitted to hospital for acute gastro - had two IV lots of this and Maxalon - lots of IV fluids - and vomited on my way out of hospital - and every 30 minutes all night following.When I've been in hospital and had this drug for HG (severe morning sickness) it did work and I was asking for water and food within half an hour.I've just taken a 4mg dissolvable and am on day 2 of the dreaded bug. Keep your fingers crossed for me xoxo

Zofran (ondansetron):I’ve been sick with the stomach flu since last night. Ate dinner, then a couple of hours later was in the bathroom throwing up with major diarrhea. Stayed on the toilet literally all night. It was one of those one little move and you feel like you’re going to throw up times. Well, once morning came the puking stopped, but I was still really nauseous with dry heaves. So I called my doctor to see if there was anything I could take, and they recommended Zofran. Wow is this a miracle drug! My nausea was gone within 10-15 minutes of taking it, and I was even able to hold down a couple of popsicles and water with it, until about an hour and a half ago when I started feeling nauseous again (the meds were wearing off, so I took another one, and within 10 minuets my nausea was gone! I even ate another popsicle and downed a little juice glass of water and didn’t throw up! If this little white, grape flavored pill isn’t magic, then I don’t know what is!

Zofran (ondansetron):God bless the manufacturers of Zofran!  I am phobic about vomiting - panic attacks just thinking about it.  That little miracle dissolves on my tongue and takes away the nausea and fear.  It has saved me trips to the ER for gastric issues. I never want to be without it.

Zofran (ondansetron):I was diagnosed with GERD at 14 and whenever I feel even slightly nauseous, I suck on a Zofran and the nausea goes away within about 2 minutes. It’s very useful but every now and then if I feel extremely nauseous it doesn’t help much.

Zofran (ondansetron):I can say I use to be a jealous husband because when our daughter gets the stomach bug I sometimes got it. There is a 50/50 chance I would get it and my wife NEVER gets it.  When I found out about zofran it saved my life.  I'm already a hypochondriac when it comes to the stomach bug, I hate it because as a child of the 90's there was no such pill and I always got the dirty bug. Now I take zofran when my daughter throws up or someone touches me with it just incase so I don't throw up and it always works because I stay upset stomach free. Just boggles my mind why docs never give it to patients, someone told me about it that's how I knew about it.

Zofran (ondansetron):22 Years on mass amounts of steroids to treat my Addison's...22 years of vomiting most days. Many hospital stays. Severe gastroenteritis. First time trying this. It's amazing! It was prescribed by a lovely at doc at my last trip to the ER. Sometimes you get lucky. My eating is broken. I'm a vibrant, beautiful 42 year old woman, and I've been reduced to a meagre 100 pounds. This helps. So far. Fingers crossed.

Zofran (ondansetron):This is a miracle drug!!!!! So many times zofran came in for the save. Saved my spouse, I and our 7 and 5 year old a trip to ER when the norovirus hit us. Took it after terrible dry heaves and within 20 minutes I was able to sleep. This medicine also helped after my csection when I was nauseous. When my son had hand foot and mouth and was uncontrollably vomiting the dr gave him this medicine too, within an hour he was eating fine! This was also great for my IBS symptoms when they hit hard.10/10 !!!

Zofran (ondansetron):I woke up at 5am with a terrible stomach virus....I swear I thought I was dying. It was coming out both ends and I was in terrible pain from the cramping. I had to lay in the floor by the toilet because I didn't have time to make it from the bed when the cramping hit me...I happened to remember that I had ondansetron(zofran) in the medicine cabinet and my wife gave me one 8mg tablet sublingual. I was better in fifteen minutes. Miracle drug!

Zofran (ondansetron):I sufffer from ulcers & get acid indigestion all the time. Of course with that I experience nausea daily..... when it gets too intense I take a 4 mg zofran and within 20-30 minutes it subsides. I thank God this medicine was created!! In the beginning I would get constipated for about 24 hours after taking a pill but don't have that anymore. I am thankful for this medicine bc I HATE nausea/vomiting.

Originally I was prescribed this med for the nausea accompanying irritable bowel syndrome, because my nausea was debilitating. Zofran definitely took the edge off.  Now I have gastritis which causes nausea and pain. Unlike other patients, I do not get great relief. Sometimes it takes the edge off. Then I am able to eat and drink and be functional.But right now, the pain and nausea of the gastritis has trumped the med, I feel pooly.

Zofran (ondansetron):I have the stomach virus. It hit me around 10 this morning but I didn't start vomiting until 2. Zofran has somewhat helped. But I'm still so weak & sick. The thought of food makes me sick.

Zofran (ondansetron):Zofran is heaven sent. It saved me and my baby's lives. I was sick for 9 months with hyperemesis gravidarum. I was on a zofran pump as well as IV HYDRATION. I don't know if my baby would have survived without it. I'm still using it for chronic nausea. I wish I could personally thank the creators of this drug. Thank you.

Zofran (ondansetron):The best little white angel pill ever, I have been feeling ill for seven days until today I decided to get help and went to a little clinic and got prescribed zofran, it must be made in heaven because that little pill worked in minutes, I went from 20% to 70% real quick. I work at a job that doesn't allow you to call in, so this pill will be saving me from losing 8 hours on my pay check. Stomach bug sucks and was tired of feeling hungry/sick every ten minutes. Thank you my white angel.

Zofran (ondansetron):Spent a week vomiting and with diarrhea. Couldn't keep anything down and was getting worse instead of better. I ended up driving to the ER with a vomit bag to my face trying not to crap myself. When they gave me the Zofran, I felt better in 5 minutes and was able to eat a little plain chicken and rice with broth a couple hours later. I didn't realize just much nausea I had until the whole room suddenly stopped waving. Slept better than I have in a long time and this morning I didn't throw up! Crackers and Gatorade for breakfast! Every 6 hours and I love this little pill.

I have a condition called gastroparesis and for three years I was in bed for 3 to 5 days a week vomiting all day.  I didn't have a life, it was slowly killing me.  My doctor give me every kind of medicine to try with no relief.  Then she give me Zofran and it was a miracle for me!  I take 8 MG and I still will occasionally be nauseated, sometimes with vomiting but as of now it's been six weeks and then it was only for a few hours.  If anyone has suffered from this it is horrible!   I realize it may not work for everyone but I was totally at the end of my rope and this saved my life!  I do have to take a laxative once in a while but I'd rather do that then living the way I was!

Zofran (ondansetron):I have to go into the hospital every two months because I start throwing up and go into a coma state if I do not get IV in me .They gave me Zofran the last time and I was up and good as new in 5 minutes. I will keep this on hand at home for future episodes !
Zofran (ondansetron):I take this occasionally for nausea due to c-diff. It helps a lot just to take a pinch of the 4mg dissolvable pill.

Zofran (ondansetron):Like one of the reviews above. I Went into ER with gastroenteritis symptoms. Could not keep down anything including water due to nausea and heavy vomitting of anything. Was given injection of zofran and a prescription for the generic ondansetron and felt less nauseous. Allows me to eat better and to sleep.
Zofran ODT (ondansetron):Oral Dissolving Tablets are the way to go.  It is quite discouraging vomiting up your nausea medicines.

I have suffered with gastrointestinal/irritable bowel syndrome problems for 15  years. This medication is literally a "miracle worker". Anytime I have a flare-up that causes nausea/vomiting, I take one pill of this and I am fine just minutes later. I remember thanking my doctor over and over for finding this medication for me. I agree with others that it makes you a little sleepy (does not knock you out though) and also if you use it several days in a row (which hopefully you do not), it can and may cause constipation. I would recommend this to anyone with frequent and/or recurring GI/IBS episodes.

Zofran (ondansetron):It hid hard and fast and took me completely by surprise when I found myself dealing with vomiting and stuff uncontrollably exiting through the other end at the very same time. A five day prescription of Zofran from my doctor took care of everything quickly and with no side effects. Thank goodness for Zofran!
Zofran (ondansetron):Excellent help with severe nausea caused by IBS, SIBO and gastritis.

Zofran (ondansetron):This is my miracle medicine. Best medicine I have ever taken in my life. Works for me in 1-2 minutes. Have nausea from acid reflux and feel instantly better. A little sleepy but it doesn't put me in a deep slumber. Love Zofran.

Zofran (ondansetron):I have used Zofran on two different occasions.  Went to the Dr for assistance after a week of vomiting because I was so miserable and weak. Felt so much better within 30 minutes I started eating the first thing I saw.  Second time I used it to bypass the stomach flu that everyone was catching.  I took it within 2 hours of symptoms; I fell asleep shaking, heart racing, with a fever and cold sweat, clutching a bucket to throw up in. Woke up 6 hours later feeling absolutely fine, just a little hungry.

Zofran (ondansetron):Went into ER with gastroenteritis symptoms. Was given two injections of Zofran and a script for pills at home. Works so well and allows me to sleep really well. A very comfortable and calm feeling into a nice deep sleep. Works well for the nausea.

Zofran (ondansetron):Could not hold water down and had heaves all the way to the ER. They gave me a different medicine first and it did nothing, so they gave me Zofran and in a few minutes I was sitting up wanting food.

Zofran (ondansetron):I took my 16 year old daughter into the ER after stomach cramps and throwing up all day long.  She was at the point she was so thirsty she would put water in her mouth and then spit it out because even a little water and she would throw up.  Once they gave her this medication she was able to drink a full glass of water within minutes and walked out of the ER wanting Mexican (which she did not get). What a difference it made?
Zofran (ondansetron):Prevented a trip to the ER.

Zofran (ondansetron):My son is 8 yrs old and could not hold anything down. The doctor gave him Zofran and he began to have hallucination! Well come to find out he is the 27 reported case in the U.S. He had to be sent to a children's hospital. My daughter is 2 and had Zofran she did really well. She did a complete 360 in minutes. Just goes to show how everybody is different.
Zofran (ondansetron):I was in the hospital for intense vomiting and stomach pain. They gave me this drug and I felt better within 2 minutes.
